name: SimpleSurvivalBlocky (Firstgame)
description:
a very simple game. Collect coins to have speed increased. Enemies grows faster if you touch them. Health is not maxed and map is limited (i dont know how i can set infinite tiles without breaking it)
the game is meant to have no sound. I find it better than forcing a sound that can be annoying

please remember is my first game, i know its simple and maybe silly but its just something i liked doing it, for the first time.
